basic.blooming: Flowering period July-September, fruiting period September-November

maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water less frequently in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Apply 1-2 times monthly in spring, no fertilization in winter when dormant
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, diseased and yellowing leaves timely
